content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 6, Maribor 0.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 6, Maribor 0.
Attempt saved. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Willian.
Goal!  Chelsea 6, Maribor 0. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Nathan Aké with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Zeljko Filipovic (Maribor) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Attempt blocked. Dare Vrsic (Maribor) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by John Terry (Chelsea).
Luka Zahovic (Maribor) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Aleksandar Rajcevic.
Dare Vrsic (Maribor) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Nemanja Matic (Chelsea).
Goal!  Chelsea 5, Maribor 0. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Marko Suler (Maribor) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Chelsea. Branislav Ivanovic draws a foul in the penalty area.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Aleksandar Rajcevic.
Willian (Chelsea) hits the bar with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Substitution, Chelsea. Dominic Solanke replaces Oscar.
Substitution, Maribor. Jean Philippe Mendy replaces Marcos Tavares.
Foul by John Terry (Chelsea).
Marcos Tavares (Maribor) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Nathan Aké (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Filipe Luis.
Substitution, Maribor. Luka Zahovic replaces Agim Ibraimi.
Attempt missed. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Didier Drogba.
Attempt saved. Eden Hazard (Chelsea) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by John Terry.
Dangerous play by Ales Mertelj (Maribor).
Nathan Aké (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Penalty missed! Still  Chelsea 4, Maribor 0. Agim Ibraimi (Maribor) hits the right post with a left footed shot.
Penalty Maribor. Agim Ibraimi draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Nemanja Matic (Chelsea) after a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt blocked. Oscar (Chelsea) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Filipe Luis.
Substitution, Chelsea. Nathan Aké replaces Cesc Fàbregas.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea).
Ales Mejac (Maribor) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Maribor. Dare Vrsic replaces Mitja Viler.
Own Goal by Mitja Viler, Maribor.  Chelsea 4, Maribor 0.
Oscar (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Petar Stojanovic (Maribor).
Attempt saved. Marcos Tavares (Maribor) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Damjan Bohar.
Foul by Oscar (Chelsea).
Ales Mejac (Maribor) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Kurt Zouma (Chelsea) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a cross.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Zeljko Filipovic.
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ales Mertelj (Maribor).
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Ales Mertelj (Maribor).
Foul by Zeljko Filipovic (Maribor).
Willian (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Second Half begins Chelsea 3, Maribor 0.
First Half ends, Chelsea 3, Maribor 0.
Attempt missed. Branislav Ivanovic (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.
Offside, Maribor. Ales Mejac tries a through ball, but Damjan Bohar is caught offside.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Damjan Bohar.
Foul by Cesc Fàbregas (Chelsea).

John Terry (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Marcos Tavares (Maribor) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Filipe Luis (Chelsea).
Attempt blocked. Agim Ibraimi (Maribor) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ales Mertelj.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Maribor 0. John Terry (Chelsea) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas following a fast break.

Penalty conceded by Ales Mertelj (Maribor) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Offside, Chelsea. Oscar tries a through ball, but Willian is caught offside.

Foul by Filipe Luis (Chelsea).
Substitution, Chelsea. Didier Drogba replaces Loïc Remy because of an injury.
Corner,  Maribor. Conceded by John Terry.
Corner,  Maribor. Conceded by Petr Cech.
Attempt saved. Agim Ibraimi (Maribor) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Zeljko Filipovic.
Goal!  Chelsea 1, Maribor 0. Loïc Remy (Chelsea) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by John Terry.
Attempt saved. Loïc Remy (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Willian with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Nemanja Matic.
Attempt missed. Ales Mertelj (Maribor) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
